details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.7.2 Tagged PDF - 6.7.2.2 Mark information dictionary
details.description: The document catalog dictionary shall include a MarkInfo dictionary containing an entry, Marked, whose value shall be true.

rule.description: The document catalog dictionary shall include a MarkInfo dictionary containing an entry, Marked, whose value shall be true.

error.message: /Marked entry of the MarkInfo dictionary is not present in the document catalog or is set to false
